text: Iti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Imi makapihwa Gwaro (maJudha nemaKristu)! Huyai kushoko rine ruenzaniso pakati pedu nemi, kuti tisave tinonamata zvimwe zvinhu kunze kwaAllah (vamwe chete), uye hatifaniri kuvasanganisa (Allah) nezvimwe zvinhu (pakunamata), uye pakati pedu hapana achatora vamwe vanhu saanamwari kunze kwaAllah.” Kana vakafuratira, vaudzei kuti: “Ivai zvapupu kuti zvirokwazvo tiri maMuslim (vanhu vakazvipira kuna Tenzi vavo).”
